page.title: 01EAST AND WEST HANNEY
page.content: The two villages in our D-block, East and West Hanney,are both rural villages surrounded by farmland. Both villages are quiet,peaceful places with only the noise of traffic and country sounds to be heard. VILLAGE GREENS. Both villages have a village green for villagers to sit, play or relax on. The green in West Hanney has a memorial cross on it. GALLOWS BRIDGE. On the road out of West Hanney,as you drive towards Charney Bassett,you come to Gallows Bridge. This made us shudder as we thought of people being hung and thrown into the water afterwards. ROMAN ROAD. The Roman Road goes through East Hanney, on the way to Oxford.
